title: Patricia Breen Camille Pissarro Snow at Louveciennes Orb
description:
Ornament developed from Camille Pissarro’s Snow at Louveciennes, 1870, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Framed with sparkling Austrian crystals, this limited edition ornament is mouth-blown, hand-painted, hand-silvered and decorated with Austrian crystals in Krakow, Poland. Embellishment encircles entire ornament. 

  • Dimensions: 3.54 x 3.14 diameter.
  • Materials: Glass, Austrian crystals.
  • Hand painted, silvered.
  • Made in Poland

*Please note: Discounts and promotional pricing do not apply.
